#summary vanmon log file format

This page describes the format of the log currently produced by the vanmon series of PIC programs.

Examples:

4D4 RAT - 8FC RA- 820D1A0D82 A

Format:

  * IDEN
  * Flags
    ** R/W - Read or Write
    ** A - Acknowledge request
    ** T - Remote Trasmission Request (RTR)
  * Data
  * Acknowledge received
